channel.title: shell on 梧桐
channel.description: Recent content in shell on 梧桐

item.title: shell
item.description: for循环 for1.sh 1 2 3 4 5 #!/bin/bash for ((i=1;i<=5;i++)) do echo $i >> test.txt done for2.sh 1 2 3 4 5 #!/bin/bash for i in {a..z} {A..Z} {0..9} # 可任意组合 do echo $i >> test.txt done for3.sh 1 2 3 4 5 #!/bin/bash for i in `ls` # ``为前置执行符 do echo $i >> test.txt done
